R

registerUser(String[], String) - Method in class vaqpack.data.VP_DatabaseManager
This function stores a registration code for a new user.
regUser(String[]) - Method in class vaqpack.data.VP_DataManager
Calls hashPassword() and generateCode() then sends these values to the Database Manager using registerUser() along with the user credentials.
resendAccess(String[]) - Method in class vaqpack.data.VP_DataManager
Calls hashPassword() and then sends it to the Database Manager with resendUserAccessCode().
resendUserAccessCode(String[], String) - Method in class vaqpack.data.VP_DatabaseManager
This function stores a brand new registration code for a user if the credentials match.
resetPass(String[]) - Method in class vaqpack.data.VP_DataManager
Calls hashPassword() and then sends it to the Database Manager with resetPassword().
resetPassword(String[]) - Method in class vaqpack.data.VP_DatabaseManager
May or may not reset a user's password.
retrieveAdmin() - Method in class vaqpack.data.VP_DataManager
Gets the database administrator credentials from the encrypted properties file that is accessible by the File Manager.
retrieveAdminEncrypted(String, String) - Method in class vaqpack.data.VP_FileManager
Retrieves the encrypted database administrator user and password from the properties file and calls decrypt().
retrieveDBLocation() - Method in class vaqpack.data.VP_DataManager
Gets the database server URL and port from the properties file that is accessible by the File Manager and sends the values to Database Manager.
retrieveFile(int) - Method in class vaqpack.data.VP_DatabaseManager
Retrieves a VaqPack user file from the database.
retrieveUrlPort() - Method in class vaqpack.data.VP_FileManager
Retrieves the database URL and port from the properties file.
revert() - Method in class vaqpack.user.VP_BusinessCard
Reverts bound properties to the last stored value
revert() - Method in class vaqpack.user.VP_CoverLetter
 
revert() - Method in class vaqpack.user.VP_Resume
 
revert() - Method in class vaqpack.user.VP_User
 
run() - Method in class vaqpack.peripherals.VP_Mail
 
run() - Method in class vaqpack.VP_Center.UpdateDynamicTask
